metadata.title: CVE-2019-9923 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description:
pax_decode_header in sparse.c in GNU Tar before 1.32 had a NULL pointerdereference when parsing certain archives that have malformed extendedheaders.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-9923` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

tar - 1.27.1-1ubuntu0.1+esm1
tar-scripts - 1.27.1-1ubuntu0.1+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: tar package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.27.1-1ubuntu0.1+esm1').
